Listen DoFollow Podcast Sign inStart free trial Log out Projects Skip to content Blog / Archives for Yevheniia Khromova Yevheniia Khromova Yevheniia is a content marketer and copywriter at SE Ranking. She is a fan of SEO, digital marketing, and content creation. Yevheniia believes simplicity is key as it helps reduce the clutter in our heads and focus on what matters. This is the principle she uses in her writing. She also enjoys cooking, learning new spices and flavors, traveling, and playing board games.
